name: Ricky Iwasaki
title: Muinjhiniyere wa Software
summary: Mutumbuluxi wa Software loyi a nga na Ntokoto, loyi a lavaka nkarhi wuntshwa wo tirhela tiphurojeke letikulu. Ku tsakela ku tumbuluxa kumbe ku engetela khodi leswaku van’wana va yi tirhisa. Ndzi tshemba leswaku vuswikoti bya mina i byintsongo loko byi pimanisiwa na inthanete, hikokwalaho ndzi tsakela swinene ku tirha na switirhisiwa swin’wana, vukorhokeri, tindzimi ta minongonoko.

education.school: Yunivhesiti ya Mfumo ya California ya Fullerton

education.degree: Diploma ya Xikolo xa le Henhla
education.school: Xikolo xa le Henhla xa Woodbridge

experience.title: Muinjhiniyere wa Software
responsibilities: Ku akiwe no tirhisa switirhisiwa swa webu leswi ringaniseriwaka hi ku tirhisa React na Node.js
Ku tirhisana na vafambisi va swikumiwa ku antswisa swilaveko na ku tiyisisa ku rhumeriwa hi nkarhi
Ku tumbuluxiwile no hlayisiwa ti-API ta RESTful ta switirhisiwa swa webu
Ku tumbuluxiwile swikripti ku endla leswaku mintirho yi tirha hi ku tirhisa michini na ku antswisa vukorhokeri

experience.title: Mupfuni wa Muleteri wa Thenisi
responsibilities: Ku dyondzisa tithekiniki ta thenisi eka ntlawa wa vatlangi va 5-10
Ku endla leswaku dyondzo yi tsakisa no tsakisa vatlangi
Vutihlamuleri bya vuhlayiseki bya vatlangi ekhoto, ngopfu ngopfu vatlangi lavatsongo na lavakulu, ku fana na vana va malembe ya 3 na va malembe ya 60

experience.title: Muhlanganisi wa le Handle
responsibilities: Ku tlhela ku vekiwa swilo leswi nga exifelefini
Ku hlawula tioda ta vaxavi va le ka inthanete
Ku paka tioda ta ku rhumeriwa
Ku layicha tioda eka tilori to yisa swilo
Ku pfuna vaxavi ku kuma swilo exitolo
Ku hlayisa ndhawu yo hlayisela swilo yi basile naswona yi hlelekile
Ku hlayisa ndhawu leyi hlayisekeke na xinghana eka vaxavi na vatirhi

projects.name: Photifoliyo
projects.description: Webusayiti leyi hlamulaka leyi kombisaka tiphurojeke na vuswikoti hi ku tirhisa thekinoloji ya webu ya manguva lawa
